name: Mortal Journey
description:
In the forgotten worlds of the lost sky's, you play as a knight navigating through dangerous levels defeating terrifying enemies throughout. 

The Knight is called Josiah and he is on a mission to survive the deadly enemies in his way and get to his safety from the forgotten world.

For many years Josiah has tried to escape this world, and many have failed.

Will you succeed where others have failed!?

PLAY NOW and find out!!
